title: Grilled Portobello Mushroom Sandwich
description: Marinated and grilled portobello mushroom cap served on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, onion, and garlic aioli.

title: French Toast
description: Thick slices of bread soaked in egg batter, fried to perfection, and served with butter and maple syrup.

title: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken breast topped with tomato sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with a side of spaghetti.

title: BLT Sandwich
description: Toasted bread filled with crispy bacon, lettuce, and tomato, served with a side of French fries.

title: Eggs Benedict
description: Two poached eggs served on top of Canadian bacon and an English muffin, topped with hollandaise sauce.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A warm, gooey chocolate cake with a melted chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

title: Beef Stroganoff
description: Tender strips of beef cooked in a rich, creamy sauce and served over a bed of egg noodles.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with our housemade Caesar dressing, croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Toasted bread topped with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of feta cheese.

title: Key Lime Pie
description: A tangy, refreshing pie made with fresh key lime juice and graham cracker crust.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection and served with a side of mixed greens and quinoa.

title: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion on a sesame seed bun.

title: Buttermilk Pancakes
description: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes served with butter and maple syrup.

title: Chocolate Brownie Sundae
description: A warm chocolate brownie served with vanilla ice cream and drizzled with chocolate sauce.

title: Filet Mignon
description: 8 oz. tender cut of beef served with a side of roasted vegetables and mashed potatoes.

title: Crab Cakes
description: Pan-fried cakes made with lump crab meat, breadcrumbs, and herbs, served with a side of remoulade sauce.

title: Bruschetta
description: Toasted slices of bread topped with a mixture of fresh tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.

title: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
description: A warm and creamy dip made with spinach, artichokes, and a blend of cheeses, served with tortilla chips.

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
description: Mushroom caps filled with a mixture of cream cheese, herbs, and breadcrumbs, baked until golden brown.

title: Garlic Bread
description: Toasted slices of bread rubbed with garlic and olive oil, served with a side of marinara sauce.
